mapper.insert: insert into smartshop (sangname, price, color, content, ipgoday) values (#{sangname}, #{name}, #{price}, #{color}, #{content}, #{ipgoday})
mapper.select: select * from smartshop order by num desc
mapper.update: update smartshop set sangname=#{sangname}, price=#{price}, color=#{color}, content=#{content} where num=#{num}
